long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save the delivery address BEFORE you go to checkout.  Our easy-to-use extension streamlines your checkout process.

Once you’ve selected an item to purchase for donation, just click on the designated button to save the delivery address and a small sticky note with that information will follow you through to the merchant checkout process.  The delivery details will be right on your checkout screen, ready for you to ship your donated items to their intended destination.  You’ll never need to search for the address, because it will always be right there with you!

Benevolist.org™ - purchasing that matters
